title: NY times.com other headline font
content:
what is this font. I'm sure they had it made for them but i want to know where i can get it. The ny times is selfish as they don't tell me.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 47.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724063733/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%2047.png) | 3.82 KB |
author: vraswant

comments.content:
If this is indeed a custom typeface, like you questioned/assumed, there may not be any way of 'getting' it. _(But, Slightly modifying 'Memphis' may get you close enough.)_

Dav
The font is Clitchy Regular. See MyFonts. com

It's not quite [Chitchy](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724063733/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/baseline/chitchy_ot/?sample_text=Campaign&sample_size=74), Robert. It is custom for _The Times_.
